title: (x) Rogers Communications corporate sans - Frutiger {Marc O}
content:
I need to figure out what the font used in the word “promotions” is...

Anyone help? (I know I should know this one, but...)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080511225359im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ROGERS_FONT_4009.png)

Thanks.

 [‹ (x) Serif face in Herb Lubalin book - Jenson (pre-digital) {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080511225359/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37438 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Quantum Enterprises, Inc. logo - ITC Eras {Greg Hoskinson (self) (Akira)} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080511225359/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37497 "Go to next forum topic")
author: breck

comments.content:
See?

Now that should’ve been obvious...

Thank-you very much.

-Breck
